name: OCThumbor
summary: Objective-C client for the Thumbor image service which allows you to build URIs in an expressive fashion using a fluent API
description: Objective-C client for the [Thumbor image service](https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/thumbor) which allows you to build URIs in an expressive fashion using a fluent API.
